page.title: 17CASSOP CHAPEL
page.content: Nearly every Sunday we go to chapel. We go into classes and our teachers in Sunday school are called Mrs Wilson, Mrs Ezart,Mrs Hutchison,plays the organ and the piano. We have a stage where we have the Anniversary.There is a kitchen for the family service.We have 2 pulpits one old one and one new one.We have 4 collecing boxs 2 wood ones and 2 brass ones.In the old chapel music was played on a violin at first.There is 1 coloured window all the rest of the windows are plain glass. We have a sign outside: it says Cassop Methodist Church Sunday School 10.30am, Devine Services at 5.30pm, Weekend Services 7pm, Registed for Solemnisation of Marriage.We have Christmas parties, family services, trips away, marriages and christenings,at our chapel.
